pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.0: 90. The training rule on itch covers
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.2: At that time the Master had allowed the itch-covering cloth for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.4: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six used over-sized itch covers.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both in front and behind.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.6: The monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.7: “How can the monks from the group of six use over-sized itch covers?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.8: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.11: Foolish men, how can you use over-sized itch covers?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.12: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.13: And, monks, this training rule should be recited thus:
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.14: ‘If a monk is getting an itch-covering cloth made, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.15: This is the right size: 1 meter long and 50 centimeters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1.16: If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.2: for the purpose of covering an itch or a boil or a running sore or a carbuncle, below the navel and above the knees.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.4: making it himself or getting someone else to make it, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.5: This is the right size: 1 meter long and 50 centimeters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.6: If he makes one or gets one made that exceeds that, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.7: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.8: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.9: If he gets others to finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.10: If he finishes himself what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.11: If he gets others to finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.12: If he makes one or gets one made for the benefit of someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.13: If he obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.20: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.1.21: The eighth rule, the training rule on itch covers, is finished.
